ansfer vacuum to the uterine cavity
o evacuate uterine contents by gently rotating the syringe and moving the cannula backward and
f
orward
o check for signs of completion:
 red or pink foam but no more tissues
 a grating sensation
 ut erus  contracts around the cannula
o withdraw the cannula.
o empty contents of the syringe into a waste bin
o remove the speculum and perform bimanual examination to check the uterus size and firmness
• Post procedure care
o give analgesia (Paracetamol 1 g six
